data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Southern Finland words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Southern Finland, Finland
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Please, teach the 161,834 believers in Southern Finland, Finland how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Southern Finland, Finland.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 161,834 believers in Southern Finland.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the South Asian, Bengali-speaking people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Southern Finland, Finland.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 1,585,500 people living in Southern Finland.
Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Southern Finland, Finland.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

location.name: Southern Finland
location.people_groups_list: Arab, Syrian, Han Chinese, Mandarin, Albanian, Moroccan, Arabic-speaking, Nepalese
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Arab, Syrian (1,100), Han Chinese, Mandarin (7,800), Albanian (6,200), Moroccan, Arabic-speaking (1,000), Nepalese (3,900)
